Hero.description: Hello! I'm Farhan Ishrak Islam, people usually call me Farhan. Thanks for checking out my portfolio site!

content.title: Frontend Development
content.description: Migrated legacy customer management UI from jQuery to React.js to improve maintainability and performance of the application through modern web development practices. Effectively used AI tools to accelerate development process.

content.title: Stock Management System Backend Development
content.description: Developed an API backend on ASP.NET to facilitate inventory stock management. Developed endpoints to handle new product creation, stock updates and product information retrieval.

content.title: Self Study on Standby
content.description: Acquiring new skills while on standby. Mainly focusing on web technologies such as Next.js, Vue.js and AWS features. Also studying about different designs and architectures used in enterprise development.

content.title: Backend Development
content.description: Developed backend API endpoints utlizing ASP.NET to handle tasks including but not limited to, server-side game data verification, game match result confirmation, inventory data updates and fetching blob files for dynamic rendering on the frontend.

content.title: Management UI Development
content.description: Developed web-based UI with standard web technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript and React for monitoring and managing user and project data.

content.title: Process Automation
content.description: Wrote Github Actions and Azure Cronjobs to automate processes such as weekly KPI report generation and daily builds of a project.

courses.thesis: Research on implementing Reinforcement Learning based enemy AI in video games
courses.regular: Structural Programming, Object-oriented Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms, AI Model Development

hana-shop.title: Hana Shop
hana-shop.summary: An e-commerce site built with Next.js and React.
hana-shop.description:
# Hana Shop (Ëä±Â±ã) üå∏

This is a e-commerce site built with React and Next.js and styled with TailwindCSS.
## Features üéâ

- Shop flowers based on categories
- Hero section with carousel image display
- Preview images from the product card carousel
- Ability to checkout using Stripe
- Admin dashboard to manage product information
- Responsive design using TailwindCSS

## Technologies ‚öôÔ∏è
- [React](https://react.dev/)
- [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/)
- [Radix UI](https://www.radix-ui.com/)
- [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/)
- [Prisma](https://www.prisma.io/) as ORM
- [Supabase](https://supabase.com/) as Postgres Database
- [Upstash Redis](https://upstash.com/) to hold cart data
- [Uploadthing](https://uploadthing.com/) to store images
- [Kinde](https://kinde.com/) for Authentication
- [Conform](https://conform.guide/) for form validation
- [Zod](https://zod.dev/) to validate data
- [Lucide](https://lucide.dev/) for icons
- [Next Themes](https://github.com/pacocoursey/next-themes) for dark mode
- [React Markdown](https://github.com/remarkjs/react-markdown) to render markdown in HTML
- [Stripe API](https://docs.stripe.com/api?lang=node) to handle product management and checkout

rhythmflow.title: Rhythmflow
rhythmflow.summary: An in-development music streaming website being developed in Next.js.
rhythmflow.description:
# Rhythmflow üéß (Currently in development)
This is a music streaming site currently being built with React and Next.js and styled with TailwindCSS.

## Features üéâ

- View songs based on artist or album
- Stream music for free!
- (Planned) Ability to like songs
- (Planned) Ability to create playlists

## Technologies ‚öôÔ∏è
- [React](https://react.dev/)
- [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/)
- [Radix UI](https://www.radix-ui.com/)
- [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/)
- [Drizzle](https://orm.drizzle.team/) as ORM
- [Turso](https://turso.tech/) as Database
- [Cloudflare R2](https://www.cloudflare.com/developer-platform/products/r2/) to store songs and images
- [Better Auth](https://www.better-auth.com/) for Authentication
- [Zod](https://zod.dev/) to validate data
- [Lucide](https://lucide.dev/) for icons

weathervue.title: WeatherVue
weathervue.summary: A weather app developed in Vue.js
weathervue.description:
# WeatherVue („Ç¶„Çß„Ç∂„Éº„Éì„É•„Éº) ‚òÄÔ∏è
This is a Vue.js based weather application styled with TailwindCSS. The app allows users to search for weather information by location on its home page.
## Features üéâ
- Location searching feature on the home page (with pre-emptive suggestions!)
- Pin locations of interest to the homepage for quick access
- Current weather display
- Weather forecast for the next few days
- Responsive design using TailwindCSS

The weather data is fetched from [OpenWeatherMap's](https://openweathermap.org/) [OneAPI](https://openweathermap.org/api/one-call-3), and the location data is fetched from OpenWeatherMap's [GeocodingAPI](https://openweathermap.org/api/geocoding-api).

## Technologies ‚öôÔ∏è
- [Vue](https://vuejs.org/)
- [Vue Router](https://router.vuejs.org/)
- [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/)
- [Axios](https://axios-http.com/)
- [Dayjs](https://day.js.org/)
